home.title: Safarkaaga Caafimaadka Waxay Ka Bilaabanaysaa Halkan
home.hero_title: Ku Soo Dhowow Gurigaaga Cusub ee Caafimaadka
home.hero_subtitle: Waxaan ka caawinnaa qaxootiga iyo muhaajiriinta inay si isku kalsoonaan ah u mareen nidaamka daryeelka caafimaadka. Ku heli kartaa luqaddaada.
home.feature1_desc: Faham sida daryeelka caafimaadku u shaqeeyo dalkaaga cusub
home.feature2_desc: Wax kasta ku hel luqadda aad ku raaxaysan tahay
home.feature3_desc: La soco ballamaha, dawooyinka, iyo macluumaadka caafimaadka
home.feature4_desc: La xiriir kheyraadka bulshada iyo adeegyada taageerada
home.step1_desc: Dhammaystir hordhicayaga si aad u fahanto nidaamka caafimaadka
home.step2_desc: Isticmaal dashboard si aad u maamusho ballamaha iyo dawooyinka
home.step3_desc: Hel kheyraadka oo mas'uul ka noqo caafimaadkaaga
home.cta_subtitle: Wax ka baro xuquuqdaada iyo kheyraadka caafimaadka daqiiqado gudahooda

onboarding.title: Bilowga
onboarding.welcome_desc: Waan ku caawin doonaa inaad fahanto sida daryeelka caafimaadku u shaqeeyo iyo kheyraadka kuu diyaar ah.
onboarding.learn_system_desc: Faham noocyada kala duwan ee xarumaha caafimaadka
onboarding.your_rights_desc: Wax ka baro xuquuqdaada daryeelka caafimaadka
onboarding.system_desc: Waxaa jira noocyo kala duwan oo xarumo caafimaad ah oo loogu talagalay baahiyo kala duwan.
onboarding.primary_care_desc: Dhakhtarkaaga ugu muhiimsan ee baaritaannada caadiga ah iyo dhibaatooyinka caafimaadka caadiga ah.
onboarding.emergency_room_desc: Kaliya degdegyada nolosha khatar ku ah.
onboarding.rights_desc: Waxaad leedahay xuquuqo muhiim ah marka ay timaado daryeelka caafimaadka.
onboarding.right_interpreter_desc: Waxaad xaq u leedahay turjubaan bilaash ah xarumaha daryeelka caafimaadka.
onboarding.complete_desc: Waad dhamaysatay hordhaca. Hadda waad diyaar u tahay inaad isticmaasho dashboard-kaaga caafimaadka.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Caafimaadka
dashboard.subtitle: Xaruntaada shakhsiyeed ee maareynta caafimaadka
dashboard.tip1_desc: Cab 8 koob oo biyo ah maalin kasta caafimaad wanaagsan.
dashboard.tip2_desc: Isku day inaad socoto 30 daqiiqo maalin kasta.
dashboard.tip3_desc: Dadka waaweyn waxay u baahan yihiin 7-9 saacadood oo hurdo ah habeen kasta.

footer.about_text: HealthBridge waxay ka caawisaa qaxootiga iyo muhaajiriinta inay maraan nidaamka caafimaadka.
footer.copyright: Â© 2024 HealthBridge. Dhammaan xuquuqda way dhowran tahay.
